<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby Portfolio Site
</h1>

My barebones portfolio website. 
- Getting familiar with Gatsby by creating a small portfolio website.


## ðŸ’» Quick Setup

1) Make sure you have gatsby npm package
```shell
npm install -g gatsby-cli
```
2) Build website on local:
```shell
cd {location-of-project}
gatsby develop
```
3) Open Local Host (localhost:8000)
